title: Various Skin Ideas (gnar, xerath etc)
body:
So I have some ideas id throw at the internet and see what gets spat back

- {{champion:101}}  Xerath we have the blue,green,red,orange/fire and soon yellow, I was wondering could we not put them all together and make a rainbow Xerath? (like the Arcade Hecarim)

- {{champion:150}}  Gnar is lacking in the love in the skin department. Seen as the poor lil fella only has one skin, why not make him a transformer? like he does transform no? why not a mecha or battlecast? 

- {{champion:55}}  Katarina why not give the spinning girl a ballet skin as all she seems to do is spin, plus it rhymes ballerina katarina..

- {{champion:38}}  Kassadin he is the sneaky sort, why not throw him in with Shen and the other assassins? I mean he is known to some at Kassassin.

- {{champion:154}}  Zac I think needs more colours (like Xerath) or even light the dude on fire and make him lava zac seen as he does melt into a puddle and reform then maybe a volcano on reformation? 

- {{champion:133}}  Freedom Day Quin because Freedom baby! (#'merica) she has the eagle XD

And why not do a UN group pack like have a bunch of Champs from different countries? players vote on the champion for each voted country?

replies.body: Lol rainbow xerath - UNLEASH THE GOOD!
Im thinking more along the lines of, how the hell are Xerath's skin going to be different when the Chromas come out...
Hey just wondering because i think a mecha Nasus{{champion:75}} will be absolutely awesome
yeah agreed, that or a battle cast :)

I actually think a Void Gnar would be awesome. In fact, I have a post about my ideas for The Missing Link.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/T0TX6cp6-void-gnar-skin-idea

Yeah... start gnar off as a Lamborghini and then for Mega Gnar have him transform into optimus prime xD
I like the ideas!
